message.content:
cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.NA, cs.GT, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with a graph theory problem related to network analysis and epidemic control, which suggests that it could belong to the Discrete Mathematics (cs.DM) or Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. The use of weighted graphs and the focus on optimization and approximation algorithms also suggest that it could belong to the Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) sub-category. The problem of locating the source of diffusion in networks is related to the Graph Theory (cs.GT) sub-category. Finally, the use of polynomial time algorithms and the analysis of approximation bounds suggest that it could belong to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category.
